aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Product Sales and Services Categories
Amazon leverages retail infrastructure to offer a wide selection of consumable and durable goods.
Amazon's product selection includes media products available in physical format.
Amazon's product selection includes media products available in digital format.
Media products include books.
Media products include videos.
Media products include games.
Media products include music.
Media products include software.
Digital products sold on a transactional basis are included in product sales.
Digital media content subscriptions that provide unlimited viewing or usage rights are included in "Subscription services."
"Physical stores" category includes product sales where customers physically select items in a store.
Sales to customers who order goods online for delivery at Amazon's physical stores are included in "Online stores."
Sales to customers who order goods online for pickup at Amazon's physical stores are included in "Online stores."
Amazon's third-party seller services include commissions.
Amazon's third-party seller services include fulfillment fees related to third-party sellers.
Amazon's third-party seller services include shipping fees related to third-party sellers.
Amazon's third-party seller services include other third-party seller services.
Amazon offers advertising services to sellers.
Amazon offers advertising services to vendors.
Amazon offers advertising services to publishers.
Amazon offers advertising services to authors.
Amazon offers advertising services to others.
Amazon's advertising programs include sponsored ads.
Amazon's advertising programs include display advertising.
Amazon's advertising programs include video advertising.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 10 â€” SEGMENT INFORMATION/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 10 â€” SEGMENT INFORMATION/

text:
We leverage our retail infrastructure to offer a wide selection of consumable and durable goods that includes media products available in both a physical and digital format, such as books, videos, games, music, and software. These product sales include digital products sold on a transactional basis. Digital media content subscriptions that provide unlimited viewing or usage rights are included in â€œSubscription services.â€

(2) Includes product sales where our customers physically select items in a store. Sales to customers who order goods online for delivery or pickup at our physical stores are included in â€œOnline stores.â€

(3) Includes commissions and any related fulfillment and shipping fees, and other third-party seller services.

(4) Includes sales of advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, authors, and others, through programs such as sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.
